Step recode

Source: R/steps.R
step_recode.Rd

Step recode

Usage

step_recode(
  svy = survey_empty(),
  new_var,
  ...,
  .default = NA_character_,
  .name_step = NULL,
  ordered = FALSE,
  use_copy = use_copy_default(),
  comment = "Recode step",
  .to_factor = FALSE,
  .level = "auto"
)

Arguments

svy

Survey object

new_var

New variable

...

Expressions to recode

.default

Default value

.name_step

Name of the step

ordered

Ordered

use_copy

Use copy

comment

Comment

.to_factor

To factor

.level

Level

Value

Survey object
